class.name: DotnetVsTestStep
class.description: A [dotnet vstest step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-dotnet-plugin) to run .NET CLI command

function.name: dotnetVsTest
function.description: Adds a [dotnet vstest step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-dotnet-plugin) to run .NET CLI command @see DotnetVsTestStep

param.name: paths
param.description: Specify paths to test assemblies. Wildcards are supported.

param.name: teamcity.build.workingDir
param.description: [Build working directory](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/Build+Working+Directory) for script, specify it if it is different from the [checkout directory](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/Build+Checkout+Directory).

param.name: test.filter
param.description: The filter type used while test run

param.name: test.names
param.description: Specify the list of test names to run.

param.name: test.testCaseFilter
param.description: Run tests that match the given expression.

param.name: framework
param.description: The target .NET Framework version to be used for test execution.

param.name: test.settingsFile
param.description: The path to the run settings configuration file.

param.name: args
param.description: Enter additional command line parameters for dotnet vstest.
